column4: AA! Not only does mldonkey-server break when it installs, but it breaks when it is removed!
Starting MLDonkey: mlnetinstall: invalid option -- f
do you know how to change that?
Just copy something else there (with sudo)
To run a sh file do "sh filename.sh"
If it is an installer you may need to let it access the system, so "sudo sh filename.sh" would do that
im installing unreal tournament 2004, and it uses a sh script... do you know any other mainstream games that are able to be played in linux??
As in, the window borders, or the panel?
its the entire top window panel
like wehre it says #ubuntu at the top up here, its not showing when i run compiz
Make sure the "decoration" plugin is loaded. If the worst comes to the worst the "compiz --replace decoration" might help
what is the application to customize compiz??
The one I know of is gset-compiz, but I think that is out dated
i have no idea how to fix this
